titles.title: We Are Here To Praise You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are here to praise You, to lift our hearts and sing We are here to give You all that we can bring, And it is Your love rising from our hearts Everything within us cries Abba Father! Help us now to give You, pleasure and delight. Hearts and minds and wills that say, I love You, Lord.{/lang-eng}
